short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to automate Lpu wifi login process.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LPU Insta Connect - Efficient extension that helps you connect to LPU wifi immediately by automatically login you in with your registration number and password relieving you of the hassle of remembering and logging into your account in every single class.

After installing the extension you do not need to remove `@lpu.com` from your Id and not even click the buttons. Just input your Id and Password one time at the extension registration page to get started. You only need to navigate or open the LPU Wifi login page and the extension will do the rest. 

Via downloading the extension you agree to follow the terms and condition listed on the LPU Wifi login page.

Important : The extension stores your data locally on your browser and does not collect and share your data of any nature with anyone.
